EmailTemplate.subject: NCS seasonal roles - get your application in before it's too late!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Our NCS seasonal roles are the perfect way to spend your summer gaining experience, earning some money and truly making a difference within your local community. If you're still considering applying for one of our roles, what are you waiting for?
You're just a few clicks away from a challenging, fun and rewarding summer - log into the staffing website now to complete your application.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
In case you need reminding, here are your login details:
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Submit your application before midnight 31st April, and we will fast-track your application!
Why should you get your application in soon?
We've offered over half our seasonal roles so far - get your application in soon to secure your preferred role Flexible roles - work a few days or a few months Gain valuable leadership skills and get paid during the summer months We have a huge variety of roles - we're bound to have one which suits you!
Why the rush?
We have just 2,000 roles left across the country, and less than two months left in our recruitment cycle - finish and submit your application as soon as possible to secure your preferred role and location.
Any questions?
If you have any questions about the NCS programme or the application process, please do get in touch - you an email us on our general helpline (seasonalroles@the-challenge.org) or contact inclusion.ss@the-challenge.org if you have any additional support needs to complete your application.
We hope to receive your application soon!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge
